text:
The day before the Fourth of July last year, I attended a naturalization ceremony. It was a touching moment, and it is disgraceful that this Administration has been delaying 730,000 naturalization applications. 
https://www.nbcnews.com/news/amp/ncna888146
A reminder this Fourth of July: it was eight immigrants who signed the Declaration of Independence. Happy Independence Day.

Today, I visited the towns of Warren, Rochester, and Bristol. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlHjCWkAEMKW1.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlHogX4AAidGp.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlHw0WkAA57pB.jpg
Classic SNL on Fourth of July fireworks.  Be careful tonight, have fun, and don’t follow this example!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RaLLZ_x34zI&feature=youtu.be

Thank you to all the supporters and volunteers who joined me in yesterday's Independence Day Parade in Montpelier. Meeting and talking to the people of Vermont is the best part of campaigning, and I look forward to seeing many more of you between now and November. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhQ7sbpUwAEClCx.jpg

RT @SenTedCruz Today we wish the United States of America a Happy 242nd birthday. Throughout her history, the United States has been a beacon for freedom, and a shining city upon a hill for the rest of the world to follow.
#IndependenceDay #Happy4thofJuly #HappyBirthdayAmerica http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1014478863009755137/pu/img/7GorK3fE5lL6SiL7.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1014478863009755137/pu/vid/320x180/PPSDrafSSC2brG5U.mp4?tag=3

RT @BrookingsGlobal “There is no reason that a country as rich and as powerful as ours should have to choose between great wealth for the few and great opportunity for all of its citizens.” @CoryBooker explores how to renew the American Dream: https://www.brookings.edu/essay/senator-booker-american-dream-deferred/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRr6DcW4AISZWq.jpg
RT @PatrickSvitek That tense #AbolishICE exchange at @BetoORourke's Rosenberg town hall begins around the 52-minute mark here: https://www.facebook.com/betoorourke/videos/1708792832503753/ #txsen

RT @BrookingsMetro The life of @CoryBooker’s father is an exceptional testament to the American Dream—and one that may no longer be possible. http://www.brookings.edu/americandreamdeferred http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhQ_QgYU8AAnKUx.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhQ_QsFUYAEBfgF.jpg

RT @CoryBooker #Happy4thofJuly! As we celebrate & rejoice in America’s blessings, let’s also take a moment to reflect on the fact that we in this country are inheritors of a great legacy. We owe a debt for our freedoms that we can’t pay back—we have an obligation to pay it forward.
Wonderful time celebrating #IndependenceDay🇺🇸 in Sulphur Springs. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSmhBkVQAUYKin.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSmhBlVAAAbKo3.jpg
Attending a town hall. Running for office. Marching. Voting. These are all ways Americans can embrace our most important title — citizen — and make a difference in our communities.

Like Frederick Douglass once said, “I do not despair of this country.” Our greatest strength has always been our ability to make this nation a more just and equal place. The work must continue, and I will fight every single day until all of us are free.

Kicking off this year's annual #JerseyRoadTrip in Camden at the @USCIS naturalization ceremony aboard the USS New Jersey. Today 42 individuals from 29 different countries took their oath of allegiance, including 8 active duty service members and one veteran. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSBPfeVQAA4ufd.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSBPdLUwAA4Cdo.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSBPdiV4AAkGM8.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSBPkiUwAAYNnv.jpg
We spy the @TexasCruzer #Cruzin behind @tedcruz! #IndependenceDay🇺🇸 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRikA1W4AA1A-N.jpg

This July 4th, I’m on my way back to Massachusetts from Iraq and Kuwait, where I visited with our troops on the ground – including soldiers from the Massachusetts Army National Guard. Our men and women in uniform are truly extraordinary. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRfGYmXcAA_bpf.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRfJX8XcAAh0jG.jpg

In many ways America is stronger than ever. But our shared national identity is in trouble. The erosion of non-political ties to one another has increasingly left us with politics as the primary source of our individual identity & as the primary influence in how we view others.

RT @joeposner 171,000 median for white. 17,600 for black.  @ezraklein and I made an Explained about that gap, narrated by @samirawiley and featuring @CoryBooker here: https://www.netflix.com/watch/80243753?trackId=14277283&tctx=0%2C8%2C0006f4bb-74fe-4a91-a77c-e099402ebfae-22644906%2C%2C

RT @BrookingsInst This #FourthOfJuly, read Senator @CoryBooker's new #Brookingsessay on policies to expand and restore the American Dream: https://www.brookings.edu/essay/senator-booker-american-dream-deferred/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=essay20 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhQks8DXcAAAl28.jpg

God bless our troops. God bless Texas. And God bless the United States of America.
#IndependenceDay #Happy4thofJuly #HappyBirthdayAmerica
Thank you to everyone who marched with us in the Rockwall #IndependenceDay🇺🇸 Parade! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhR0nSLXcAEGCcx.jpg

Our military support played a significant role in enabling the Iraqi Security Forces to retake their country – but only the Iraqis can do the hard work needed to rebuild and prevent extremist threats from reemerging. They need the world's support in this effort. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRkx4uWsAA2SlB.jpg
RT @TeamTedCruz #KeepOnCruzing #IndependenceDay🇺🇸 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRgoKIX0AEo3Uo.jpg

I met with Iraqi Prime Minister al-Abadi. We discussed Iraq's recent elections, our countries’ joint commitment to defeating ISIS and combating terrorism in the region, and our shared desire to build a better life for the Iraqi people.

RT @jskarp A Nathan’s hot dog has 24 carbs.

Joey Chestnut ate 74 hot dogs.

Eating 1776 carbs and 74 hot dogs on 7/4 is the most American stat in history.

RT @SenTedCruz This #IndependenceDay, may we never forget the men & women who have sacrificed to make this nation the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. May we always give thanks to those who protect us every single day, from sea to shining sea.
#HappyBirthdayAmerica #Happy4thofJuly
Be free, yet without using freedom as a pretext for evil, but as slaves of God.  1 Peter 2:16

RT @PatrickSvitek Here we go. "How can you sit there and say you’re not for abolishing ICE when it’s a terroristic organization?" a woman asks @BetoORourke at his Rosenberg town hall. Democrats need to "grow a backbone" and get behind eliminating ICE, she adds. #txsen

Our goal is not to make #MadeinChina2025 fail. Our goal is & must remain a U.S. & #China relationship that is balanced & a competition that is fair instead of one China wins as a result of cheating & theft of our intellectual property.   https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/04/technology/made-in-china-2025-dongguan.html?smprod=nytcore-ipad&smid=nytcore-ipad-share

Spending a day walking in parades, meeting with volunteers, speaking to supporters and Vermonters, and enjoying the beautiful Vermont weather was a great pleasure. I look forward to many more like it this summer. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlKR-W0AEAc-6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlKXgXkAA6Lwo.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSlK9dXUAIhjuB.jpg

RT @PatrickSvitek Wow. @BetoORourke emphasizes his Tornillo advocacy at length, then tells the woman: "So don't lecture me about the border & immigrants & things that we need to do. I'm doing everything that I can right now & I will continue to do everything that I can." https://twitter.com/PatrickSvitek/status/1014309271578841090 QT @PatrickSvitek Here we go. "How can you sit there and say you’re not for abolishing ICE when it’s a terroristic organization?" a woman asks @BetoORourke at his Rosenberg town hall. Democrats need to "grow a backbone" and get behind eliminating ICE, she adds. #txsen
Our country’s greatest strength has always been our ability to make it a more just and equal place.

I’m grateful to each of our servicemembers for the sacrifices they make to keep our country safe. And I’m honored to have celebrated this Independence Day with these brave men and women. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRlE76WAAULpvN.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRlFEqX4AAS06n.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRlFFcXkAEn8Qf.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRlE7eWAAAICe1.jpg
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhSQgJLWAAAAgnk.jpg

I met with Ambassador Silliman and several Foreign Service Officers at the US embassy in Baghdad. Our diplomats abroad are our eyes and ears on the ground in some of the world's most challenging places – and they often put their lives on the line as well. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRj4ZcW4AAk1X9.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRj4REXcAYODlk.jpg

2/2: "that government is only a convenience created and managed by the people, with no powers of its own except those voluntarily granted to it by the people. We sometimes forget that great truth, and we never should. Happy Fourth of July.” — Pres. Ronald Reagan #IndependenceDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhQ1WCYUcAILF8p.jpg
1/2: “Let the Fourth of July always be a reminder that here in this land, for the first time, it was decided that man is born with certain God-given rights…

I joined @LindseyGrahamSC in Iraq for a tour of Mosul. The city was controlled by ISIS until a year ago, when Iraqi Security Forces liberated it with US support. Much of the city is still in ruins, but the Iraqis are working hard to rebuild. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRiwSuW0AAMU41.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRiwBaW4AA3DEg.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRiwAdXcAEDHCY.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRiwLEW0AAHROW.jpg
This Fourth of July I’m fueled by love and optimism to create a better nation for all. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRSI7TUEAAUIPy.jpg

RT @CathyKnoff Our FMJ robotics students had the wonderful opportunity to meet up again with Senator Ted Cruz and House Rep John Ratcliffe at the Rockwall City 4th of July parade. 1st meeting was in Washington DC at the FIRST NAC conference. @FRCTeam1296 @tedcruz @RatcliffeTX4 @FIRSTinTexas http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRj-QKU8AUEVDj.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRj-QKUwAARojz.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRj-QLUcAA-BSy.jpg

RT @ValaAfshar If you want more kindness in the world: be more kind. 

If you want more love in the world: be more loving.

If you want more hope in the world: be an agent of hope in another’s life. 

One small ray of light can lead the world out of darkness. —@CoryBooker http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DhRM-G-XUAADHH2.jpg

Our nation must not lose our commitment to the values emblazoned on the Statue of Liberty: “Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free.”

#Happy4thofJuly! As we celebrate & rejoice in America’s blessings, let’s also take a moment to reflect on the fact that we in this country are inheritors of a great legacy. We owe a debt for our freedoms that we can’t pay back—we have an obligation to pay it forward.

This July 4th no matter if you're on the right the left or anywhere in between, let us renew our commitment to following the path of a restrained limited government to best protect our God given liberties. From our family to yours may you have a happy 4th of July. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1014460264668942336/img/ZOtVYGEL3anIPFfJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1014460264668942336/vid/320x180/SsG0iWc-VcJvK1p3.mp4?tag=3
